patterns: Can you give me a list of projects
What's project good in the beginning
responses: From my point of view, for the starter, you should learn more about python, understand more definitions, basic principles and you can start with some Basic Python Projects for example: Desktop Notifier App in Python, Binary Search Algorithm or Convert Text to Speech in Python. After that, you can try higher level projects in Intermediate Python Projects such as Calculator in Python, Random Password Generator in Python, Text Editor in Python. Learning from practical projects will help you step by step using Python proficiently and working with a plenty of amazing projects in Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Data Science.

A chatbot is an intelligent piece of software that is capable of communicating and performing actions similar to a human. Chatbots are used a lot in customer interaction, marketing on social network sites and instantly messaging the client. There are two basic types of chatbot models based on how they are built; Retrieval based and Generative based models.

patterns: How can I use this app
responses: There are two main parts of the interface. There is a chat window box located above where you can see my answers while the below box are tool box with some simple symbols where you can enter text or input for example audio, voice from microphone or handwritten and send button to chat with me. In addtional, you can minimize or close this application as other normal applications with 3 familiar symbols of Windows at the top of this app but I have to goodbye you immediately.

patterns: Do you know who you are
responses: I am a simple chatbot created by Nguyen Nam Cuong when he need some practical projects to prepare for finding a job when he just graduated from university.
